column1: ConditionsPer San Francisco Police Code Section 2908, noiseshall not exceed 5dBA above ambient levels measuredat the nearest property line between the hours8PM-7AM without a Night Noise permit.Event/Operation:Permit Linear Footage1400Elements of OccupancyManhole diving 2 seperate manholes along Geary and9th avenues.  Will have to shift traffic out of lanes tooccupy manholes for 1-2 hour time periods.From:9/8/2015 09:00PMStart Time9:00PMTo:9/10/2015 04:00AMEnd Time04:00AMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, call(415) 554-5824 a minimum of 72 hours prior tooccupancy.  To tow a vehicle call the Tow Desk at(415) 553-1200.Special Traffic permit requiredCALL FOR Special traffic permit MAY BE required(Please check DPT Blue Book for any trafficrestrictions; to obtain a "Blue Book", please contactMTA at (415) 701-4673).Food:NOther:Performing Arts:NStreet Space Hours9:00PM Thru 04:00AMMeter Segment(s)09TH AVE: CLEMENT ST intersection 09/07/2015thru 09/08/2015 (2 days) 09TH AVE: CLEMENT ST toGEARY BLVD (300 - 399) 09/07/2015 thru 09/08/2015(2 days) CLEMENT ST: 09TH AVE intersection09/07/2015 thru 09/08/2015 (2 days) GEARY BLVD:08TH AVE to 09TH AVE (4400 - 4498) -- NORTH --09/07/2015 thru 09/08/2015 (2 days)Night Noise
